questions.text: A particle is suspended by two ideal strings as shown in the figure. Choose the correct statement.

options.A: The period of oscillation of the system is 2π√(3l/g)
options.B: The period of oscillation of the system is 2π√(l/g)
options.C: The period of oscillation of the system is independent of l
options.D: If the distance between the suspension points was kept constant and the length of strings were quadrupled then the period doubles

questions.text: If a projectile is launched with velocity u at an angle θ, the horizontal range is:
